titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to issue regulations authorizing the purchase and eradication of swine infected with or exposed to brucellosis, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2476-2478)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Senate Committee on Agriculture discharged by Unanimous Consent.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 389.

bill.summary: 3/8/1994--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to issue regulations authorizing the purchase and eradication of swine infected with brucellosis.
